function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential development changes in construction and built environment sectors","Impact":"Possible spread of contagious diseases due to changes in construction practices and built environment design","Mitigation":"Incorporating health and safety measures in new design and construction practices, implementing strict hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Smart and digital technologies for contactless systems, advanced ventilation and air filtration systems","People":"Construction workers, building occupants, general public","Owner":"Construction companies, building owners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Expected economic impacts leading to new paradigms in engineering and design of built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to rapid changes in built environment design and engineering practices","Mitigation":"Promoting resilient and smart development, integrating health and safety considerations in design and engineering processes","Technologies":"Smart-hybrid models, digital design tools, advanced materials with antimicrobial properties","People":"Engineers, architects, construction professionals, building occupants","Owner":"Engineering firms, architecture firms, construction companies, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Faster push towards digitization and digitalization in more developed cities","Impact":"Potential reliance on digital systems may lead to oversight of health and safety measures and increased exposure to contagions","Mitigation":"Implementing robust health monitoring systems, integrating digital platforms with health and safety monitoring technologies","Technologies":"Health monitoring applications, IoT sensors for environmental monitoring, digital platforms for real-time health and safety alerts","People":"Urban residents, city planners, government authorities","Owner":"City authorities, technology companies, urban development organizations"}]}
